stylist.name: Amanda
stylist.title: Owner and Stylist at Luxe Color Lab
stylist.talent: Specializes in color and color correction
stylist.bio: Amanda has been a stylist for 18 years she worked in Sarasota Florida for 13 years before coming to Charlotte 4 years ago. She has owned her salon here for over a year and has expanded. Amanda specializes in color correction and blonding. She also is versed in precision hair cutting.
